Intervention: - randomized to receive celecoxib per day for 12 months
- randomised to receive placebo daily for 12 months
Eligibility: Women at high risk of breast cancer
• Pregnant women or within 12 months of breastfeeding/birth
Results: Change in percentage of breast epithelial cells that are positive for Ki-67
The immunocytochemical staining of the breast epithelial cells. Positive cells reflect the proliferative activity.
Description of the arm/group: randomized to receive celecoxib per day for 12 months
Unit of measurement: percentage of positive cell stains -1,2 (-18 to 14.8)
Description of the arm/group: randomized to receive placebo daily for 12 months
Unit of measurement: percentage of positive cell stains -2.0 (-8.8-12.2)
